content: stiches from your waste yarn back to your needles it doesn t matter if you start on the leg or foot side of your waste yarn just make sure your sock is not inside out picking up your stitches o you re picking up two extra stitches to ensure you don t have a gap between your heel and the body of the sock o pick up the right leg of the stitch just before your waste yarn begins pick up the right leg of the 28 32 36 sts that are attached to the waste yarn on your first side then pick up the right leg of the following stitch you should have picked up 30 34 38 sts o repeat this for the other side pick up the right leg of the stitch before the waste yarn the right leg of the next 28 32 36 sts that are attached to the waste yarn then the right leg of an extra stitch at the end of the waste yarn you should have picked up a total of 60 68 76 sts with cc knit 1 full round across all 60 68 76 sts and then you ll work the decreases exactly like you did for the toe repeat the below rounds 1&2 until you have 24 28 32 sts total o round 1 *k1 ssk k to 3 sts before m or end of your first set of 28 32 36 sts k2tog k1 *repeat to end o round 2 knit once you have a total of 24 28 32 sts divide stiches evenly across two needles and graft together using kitchener stitch link to kitchener stitch video weave in the ends detailed instructions for key stitches ssk slip slip knit - a left-leaning decrease 1 slip the first stitch on your left needle as if to knit 2 slip the next stitch on your left needle as if to knit 3 insert the left needle in the front of those two stitches on the right needle and knit those two slipped stitches together 3 ©2023 tree line woolens llc for personal non-commercial use only do not distribute without permission from the author 4 you will have 1 stitch k2tog knit two together - a right-leaning decrease 1 insert right needle into the first two stitches on the left needle as if to knit 2 knit those two stitches together 3 you will have 1 stitch provisional cast on link to video kitchener stitch link to video our goal at tree line woolens is to further your love for the beautiful art of knitting we hope our designs are fun & enjoyable for the most experienced knitter while offering all the helpful tips & tricks to those newer in their journey please don t be a stranger connect with us on instagram @treeline_woolens and show off your creation and subscribe to our youtube channel @treelinewoolens for more demos 4 ©2023 tree line woolens llc for personal non-commercial use
